title: Wiley (publisher)
summary: John Wiley & Sons, Inc., commonly known as Wiley (/ˈwaɪli/), is an American multinational publishing company founded in 1807 that focuses on academic publishing and instructional materials. The company produces books, journals, and encyclopedias, in print and electronically, as well as online products and services,[1] training materials, and educational materials for undergraduate, graduate, and continuing education students.[2]
